app_descript:
App Name: Habitify

Brief: Habitify is an intuitive and powerful habit tracker designed to aid individuals in building and maintaining good and healthy habits. The app helps organize habits into a daily routine that fits individual lifestyles and provides insightful tracking and reminders to ensure consistent habit performance.

  • Detailed Analytics: Analyze your habit performance with comprehensive tracking stats, including trends, rates, averages, and totals ğŸ“Š.
  • Reflection Notes: Create and maintain habit notes for deeper insight and guidance on your habit-development path ğŸ“.
